VanillaOS shipped with T2 Kernel.

[Find out if your Mac has a T2 chip.](https://everymac.com/)
**Macbook Pro 16,4 users use the safe graphics option**
**Follow the Ubuntu guide here**
[T2 Linux website](https://t2linux.org)

[VanillaOS help page](https://vanillaos.org/help)

[T2 Ubuntu Repository](https://adityagarg8.github.io/t2-ubuntu-repo/)

This is all possible thanks to the amazing work @t2linux and @Vanilla-OS.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/LED-esma/T2-VanillaOS/commits/T2-22.10

**[Download here.](https://github.com/LED-esma/T2-VanillaOS/suites/14836369786/artifacts/844833313)**

[Wifi and Bluetooth](https://wiki.t2linux.org/guides/wifi-bluetooth/)
